sources.title: Sparkling 3
sources.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
ずっと咽せ返るような煙の中
(즈웃토 무세카에루 요오나 케무리노 나카)
계속해서 숨이 막힐 듯한 연기 속에서

終わりなきその発信源
(오와리나키 소노 핫신겐)
끝이 없는 그 발원지

知る由もなかった、ただ漂う
(시루 요시모 나캇타, 타다 타다요우)
알 길이 없었어, 그저 떠다니는

君のせいだ
(키미노 세이다)
너 때문이야


[Pre-Chorus]
手放すのが怖かったのか
(테바나스노가 코와캇타노카)
놓아버리는 게 무서웠던 걸까

支えるのが痛かったのか
(사사에루노가 이타캇타노카)
지탱하는 게 아팠던 걸까

東西南北、指針さえ失って
(토우자이난보쿠, 시신사에 우시낫테)
동서남북, 지침조차 잃어버리고

惹かれていくその先は
(히카레테 이쿠 소노 사키와)
이끌려가는 그 끝은

やっぱり、君からの
(얏파리, 키미카라노)
역시, 너로부터의


[Chorus]
昔から終わらないこのスモーク
(무카시카라 오와라나이 코노 스모-크)
예전부터 끝나지 않는 이 연기

蜃気楼のように揺らめいて
(신기루노 요오니 유라메이테)
신기루처럼 일렁이다가

儚く消える蝋燭のように
(하카나쿠 키에루 로오소쿠노 요오니)
허무하게 꺼지는 촛불처럼

カルマみたいに積み上げられた
(카르마 미타이니 츠미아게라레타)
카르마처럼 쌓아 올려진

君という迷路
(키미토 이우 메이로)
너라는 미로


[Bridge]
飛んでも翼はなく
(톤데모 츠바사와 나쿠)
날아도 날개는 없고

走っても既に手遅れ
(하싯테모 스데니 테오쿠레)
달려도 이미 늦어버렸고

這いつくばっても同じ
(하이츠쿠밧테모 오나지)
기어봐도 똑같아

全部、君から始まった
(젠부, 키미카라 하지맛타)
전부, 너로부터 시작됐어

sources.title: Scale Skin 1
sources.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I walked into the dark, where shadows creep and crawl
Ignored the gleaming gold, the treasures in the hall
They came for riches, came to steal and fight
But I just wanted you, the monster in the night

[Pre-Chorus]
Not a hero with a sword, no prince to save the day
Just a girl who saw the soul beneath the scales of gray
You offered me the world, a key to every door
But I chose the beating heart, nothing less and nothing more

[Chorus]
Human and Dragon, bound by time and fate
Locked in a cycle of love and endless wait
One soul in two bodies, a curse we can’t outrun
Chasing shadows till the setting of the sun
We’re burning in the fire of a love that isn't fair

[Verse 2]
You foolish little thing, why did you pay the price?
Trading life for scales, a noble sacrifice
I told you to be free, to leave this cursed place
But now I see my eyes upon your human face

[Bridge]
I turned the hourglass, I broke the laws of time
To find a way to save you, to make the stars align
But every path I take, you fade into the mist
A ghost within the stone, a memory dismissed

[Outro]
So take my magic now, let destiny unfold
A man stands in the ruins, a story to be told
Dragon, breathe the air, the sky is finally blue
I lost myself to find the life that belongs to you

sources.title: Scale Skin 2

sources.title: Stardust Paradox 1
sources.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I don't want my dust to fade in pain
Just a galactic dream, a soft refrain
A fish out of water, walking the tide
An earth lost in space, nowhere to hide

[Pre-Chorus]
The milky way washed my dust away
In this twisted world, I went astray
Misread my heart, a momentary fault
In the end, I never became the sea's salt

[Chorus]
Didn't want to forget, didn't want to recall
Ignoring the cracks in the crumbling wall
To turn a blind eye was my only plea
But knowing the truth wears down on me

[Bridge]
Leaning on the galaxy inside my mind
Leaving the scattered dust behind
Drifting apart in the cosmic flow
Letting myself go, letting myself go

[Outro]
Dust scatters like stars in the night
Still shimmering, burning so bright
Where did I go? Am I lost at sea?
Does the dust still remember me?

sources.title: Lightkeeper 1
sources.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You crack the curtain
Dust in the air
Lines on the carpet
Cross in a square
You say
“Look closer”
“You’re missing the show”
Tiny galaxies
Spinning in gold

[Chorus]
You are my lightkeeper
Turning little lamps on in my head
Painting every corner
Where the shadows always spread
You are my lightkeeper
Holding up a match in all this gray
Small flame
Slow breath
But it keeps the dark away

[Verse 2]
Plastic blue lighter
Chipped at the side
Names on the metal
Burnt into time
Laughing on asphalt
Rain in your hair
“Storm’s just a backdrop”
You don’t seem scared

[Chorus]
You are my lightkeeper
Turning little lamps on in my head
Painting every corner
Where the shadows always spread
You are my lightkeeper
Holding up a match in all this gray
Small flame
Slow breath
But it keeps the dark away

[Bridge]
If every bulb blew out
And the sky went bare
I’d still see your outline
Just knowing you’re there (hey)

[Chorus]
You are my lightkeeper
Turning little lamps on in my head
Saving all the pieces
Of the things I almost shed
You are my lightkeeper
Holding up a match in all this gray
Say we’ll stay right here
Till the dark forgets the way

Where the shadows always spread
You are my lightkeeper
Holding up a match in all this gray
Small flame
Slow breath
But it keeps the dark away

[Bridge]
If every bulb blew out
And the sky went bare
I’d still see your outline
Just knowing you’re there (hey)

[Chorus]
You are my lightkeeper
Turning little lamps on in my head
Saving all the pieces
Of the things I almost shed
You are my lightkeeper
Holding up a match in all this gray
Say we’ll stay right here
Till the dark forgets the way

sources.title: Brownie Smoothie 1
sources.lyrics:
[Intro]
I don't want a lover

[Chorus]
I don't want a lover
I want a smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie
I don't want a lover
I want a smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie

[Verse 1]
Yes
I want to drink my cake
Wanna take a slurp of that devil's food
Wanna savor the flavor of a milkshake
With chunks of fudge and a taste that's true
It's a dark brown shake
That chocolate glue
I'm off of you
I'm onto that food
I don't wanna hang out
I don't want no date
No going out
Just take me to the place
You and me ain't on the same page
I need it now
I don't wanna wait

[Chorus]
I don't want a lover
I want a smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie
I don't want a lover
I want a smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie

[Verse 2]
I don't want a lover
No
I want a treat
Take me to the kitchen
Got something to eat
To go to the table
Got something to see
Got chocolate and caramel
Sugar and cream
My blender is full
And the liquid is thick
Like twenty below
I get shivers and chills
It cools my throat
And it gives me a kick
That caramel glow
Now I'm ready to dip

[Chorus]
I don't want a lover
I want a smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie
I don't want a lover
I want a smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie (Smoothie)
A brownie smoothie
